p: The viral RNA for all of the virus preparations was quantified prior to their treatments using reverse-transcription droplet digital PCR (RT-ddPCR). RT-ddPCR was performed with One-Step RT-ddPCR advanced kit for probes (Bio-Rad, USA) as described by Mehle et al. ( 2018) with minor modifications i.e., thresholds of 2400 were not always used during analyses and data with < 10,000 droplets were not discarded.
